languages.text: "Жаль, но вы правы, шерин. Как бы ни была мягка постель, как бы ни была приятна компания, есть черта, которую нельзя переступать. А я опасно близка к тому, чтобы совершить это, раздобыв пару бутылок вкусного лекарства для наших страдающих голов".

"I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."
languages.original_text: "Жаль, но вы правы, шерин. Как бы ни была мягка постель, как бы ни была приятна компания, есть черта, которую нельзя переступать. А я опасно близка к тому, чтобы совершить это, раздобыв пару бутылок вкусного лекарства для наших страдающих голов".

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “很遗憾，你说得没错，亲爱的。无论床有多么舒服，伴侣有多么美妙，有些事情都是绝对不能做的。我差点就越过了那条线，我本打算弄来几瓶美味的药片，和你一起尝尝，解决宿醉带来的头疼。”
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，你说得没错，亲爱的。无论床有多么舒服，伴侣有多么美妙，有些事情都是绝对不能做的。我差点就越过了那条线，我本打算弄来几瓶美味的药片，和你一起尝尝，解决宿醉带来的头疼。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「残念だけど、あんたの言う通りだよ、シャリーン。どんなに柔らかいベッドでも、どんなに楽しい仲間でも、越えちゃいけないラインがあるんだ。頭痛に効く美味しい薬を何本かもってくることで、その一線を越えそうになっていたところだよ」
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."

traits.locale_text: 「残念だけど、あんたの言う通りだよ、シャリーン。どんなに柔らかいベッドでも、どんなに楽しい仲間でも、越えちゃいけないラインがあるんだ。頭痛に効く美味しい薬を何本かもってくることで、その一線を越えそうになっていたところだよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Lamento confirmar que tiene razón, shereen. Da igual lo blanda que sea la cama y lo agradable que sea la compañía, hay una línea que no podemos cruzar. Y me estoy acercando peligrosamente a ella al conseguir un par de botellas de deliciosa medicina para el dolor de cabeza».
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento confirmar que tiene razón, shereen. Da igual lo blanda que sea la cama y lo agradable que sea la compañía, hay una línea que no podemos cruzar. Y me estoy acercando peligrosamente a ella al conseguir un par de botellas de deliciosa medicina para el dolor de cabeza».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai bien peur que vous ayez raison, shereen. Votre lit a beau être confortable et votre compagnie fort agréable, il y a des limites à ne pas franchir. Et je suis dangereusement proche de les piétiner allègrement en allant chercher deux flacons d'un délicieux remède pour nos migraines. »
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien peur que vous ayez raison, shereen. Votre lit a beau être confortable et votre compagnie fort agréable, il y a des limites à ne pas franchir. Et je suis dangereusement proche de les piétiner allègrement en allant chercher deux flacons d'un délicieux remède pour nos migraines. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss Euch leider recht geben, Shereen. So weich wie das Bett oder so angenehm Eure Gesellschaft auch ist, es gibt eine Grenze, die wir nicht überschreiten dürfen. Aber ich stehe kurz davor, genau das zu tun, indem ich uns ein paar Flaschen mit köstlicher Medizin für unsere schmerzenden Köpfe besorge."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Euch leider recht geben, Shereen. So weich wie das Bett oder so angenehm Eure Gesellschaft auch ist, es gibt eine Grenze, die wir nicht überschreiten dürfen. Aber ich stehe kurz davor, genau das zu tun, indem ich uns ein paar Flaschen mit köstlicher Medizin für unsere schmerzenden Köpfe besorge."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bu bana her ne kadar üzüntü verse de haklısın şirinim. Yatak ne kadar yumuşak, yanımızdaki kişi de ne kadar hoş olursa olsun, aşmamamız gereken bazı çizgiler var. Ben de ağrıyan başlarımız için leziz mi leziz ilaçlarla dolu bir çift şişe getirerek tam olarak bunu yapmaya tehlikeli derecede yakınım."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to say you're right, shereen. No matter how soft the bed or how pleasant the company, there is a line we must not cross. And I am perilously close to doing exactly that by getting a couple of bottles of delicious medicine for our aching heads."

traits.locale_text: "Bu bana ne kadar üzüntü verse de, haklısın şirinim. Yatak ne kadar yumuşak, yanımızdaki kişi de ne kadar hoş olursa olsun, aşmamamız gereken bazı çizgiler var. Ve ben de ağrıyan başlarımız için leziz mi leziz ilaçlarla dolu bir çift şişe getirerek tam olarak bunu yapmaya tehlikeli derecede yakınım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
